title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, and run local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs plus Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) for Ollama with conversation history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting you use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; supports slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-nvidia-triton
summary: Bridge that exposes Ollama models through NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for enterprise GPU clusters.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels via mentions or slash commands.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Tutorial repo showing how to create a custom Modelfile and fine-tune Mistral-7b with LoRA for Ollama.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, integrations, tutorials and community projects around Ollama.
